# Reading data into R

::: {layout="[[85,15]]" layout-valign="center"}

![DS workflow](./figures/Data_wrangling.png)


![packages](./figures/readr_readxl.png)


:::


Reading data is the first step of data wrangling and of course essential prior to any data analysis. 
R provides multiple ways to read data of various formats. In this course, we focus on 2-dimensional, rectangluar data, i.e. simple tables, which is stored as text files or as excel-files.
